amendment.description: Amendment adds a sense of Congress that the Civilian Property Realignment Commission should take steps to provide assistance to small and minority-owned businesses seeking to be awarded contracts and requires the Commission to report to Congress and the President every 6 months regarding contracting and the size of the entities awarded contracts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-385 to add a sense of Congress that the Civilian Property Realignment Commission should take steps to provide assistance to small and minority-owned businesses seeking to be awarded contracts and requires the Commission to report to Congress and the President every 6 months regarding contracting and the size of the entities awarded contracts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
